The example database used to support the exercises in this tutorial, &webkb;, was developed from the publicly available WebKB relational data set developed by the Text Learning Group at Carnegie-Mellon University. The version used for the Proximity tutorial has been modified from the original distribution to meet the needs of this tutorial. The original dataset is available from www-2.cs.cmu.edu/~WebKB/.

General inquiries regarding Proximity should be directed to:
Knowledge Discovery Laboratory c/o Professor David Jensen, Director Department of Computer Science University of Massachusetts Amherst, Massachusetts 01003-9264
